scripts.deploy:rinkeby: graph deploy --product hosted-service --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ pr1s0nart/pr1s0nart-subgraph-rinkeby ./subgraph.rinkeby.yaml --access-token
scripts.deploy:mainnet: graph deploy --product hosted-service --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ pr1s0nart/pr1s0nart-subgraph-mainnet ./subgraph.mainnet.yaml --access-token
scripts.deploy:local: pnpm clean && pnpm prepare-yaml && pnpm codegen && graph deploy --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001 pr1s0nart/pr1s0nart-subgraph-localhost ./subgraph.localhost.yaml
